item.title: Trump Deserves Credit for Action on Nigeria’s Religious Persecution
item.description: He is upholding religious freedom as a pillar of American foreign policy, despite criticism of the move filled with misconceptions and disinformation.

item.title: Lessons About Power from Middle-earth
item.description: A story that needs retelling in our age of rage.

item.title: The Trump DOJ’s Vindictive Reply to Comey’s Claim of Vindictive Prosecution
item.description: This week produced one of the most bizarre submissions to a court that I’ve seen.

item.title: The Pol Who Wants to Replace Pelosi Makes Her Look Normal
item.description: Scott Wiener has compiled a record of utterly bonkers legislation, offering proof that his party cannot be trusted around children.

item.title: Rembrandt Rules at the Norton Museum in West Palm Beach
item.description: Seventeen Rembrandts, masterpieces by his best students, and the Leiden Collection, a pioneer in philanthropy.
